Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerDistributionMetrics.description: This is the schema definition for the metrics of a power distribution component or unit, such as a floor power distribution unit (PDU) or switchgear.
PowerDistributionMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the metrics of a power distribution component or unit for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

EnergykWh.description: The energy consumption of this unit.
EnergykWh.longDescription: This property shall contain the total energy, measured in kilowatt-hours (kWh), for this unit, that represents the `Total` ElectricalContext sensor when multiple energy sensors exist.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PowerWatts.description: The total power reading for this equipment.
PowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total power, measured in Watts, for this unit, that represents the `Total` ElectricalContext sensor when multiple power sensors exist.

ResetMetrics.description: This action resets the summary metrics related to this equipment.
ResetMetrics.longDescription: This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this equipment.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #PowerDistributionMetrics.v1_0_0.PowerDistributionMetrics
